website_summaries.verdict: A translucent cream that's light, smooth and easy to apply.
pros: Keeps eye color bright without making the shades too harsh or unblendable
Keeps makeup crease-free and is exceptionally long-lasting
cons: Can be tricky to remove, and some detractors on the scent

customer_reviews.title: very smooth going on eyelid, allergenic, shade is good match
customer_reviews.text: I have not finished using this yet, but so far it seems to last quite a while. You don't need to apply very much (a little goes a long way). I am often allergic to skin products of any type but not this...good value and it does make a difference when applying eye shadow. This particular product softens the colors so they don't appear harsh.
customer_reviews.author: GeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Not clumpy or goopy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought tgis stuff when her other eye primer ran out. Says it makes her makeup pop and isn't sticky or gross feeling. It's a great primer and she highly recommends it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have long nails so I applied this with a Q-tip evenly on my eyelids. My eyeshadow lasted the entire day and it was a scorcher outside. Thank you so much and I highly recommend this product at great and affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel m.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a makeup expert. A little goes a long way . In fact if you put too much you can feel it and your eyelid feels heavy. There is no color or tint to this primer. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Cat

customer_reviews.title: Applies on nice, not sticky or too obvious
customer_reviews.text: Brown skin black female. Applies on nice, not sticky or too obvious.
customer_reviews.author: The Princess

customer_reviews.title: WILL BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Great consistency. This eyeshadow primer is very worth the price. I use it as a base for my everyday eyeshadow application. But, I found it to be very helpful as a barrier for my silver face makeup for a tin man Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Lasso Of Truth

customer_reviews.title: not a true primer
customer_reviews.text: I should have listen to some of the reviewers. This product is not a true primer like Smashbox and others. After 1 hour, the eyeliner is in the crease of your eye. not worth the money. stick to NYX, Smashbox and the best is Lancomes. It lasts forever. sorry. am giving it to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: deedee crooks

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work perfectly, I still get creases. I have SUPER hot skin all of the time. It works better than other products I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long wearing
customer_reviews.text: This eye primer is long lasting. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mighty little tube
customer_reviews.text: The best eye lid primer, leaves the lid just a little tacky so it holds liner and shadow crease proof for hours.
customer_reviews.author: CRose

customer_reviews.title: Worst Primer I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Smashbox and L’Oreal primers and expected comparable performance from this product. Nope. Product is slightly oily, but turns powdered eye shadow into a disaster. I like the color tone, but tossed the thing into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: BookHoundSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Good Eyeshadow Primer
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this covered the redness on my eyelids from years of rubbing and applying eye shadow. My eye shadow stays on with this.
customer_reviews.author: danmac

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really do anything. Creases are still there. The search continues.
customer_reviews.author: MaMaMao

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: Other primers can be sticky and hard to remove. This one is smooth, easy to go on and makes your shadow last!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Eyeshadow primer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! It would be nice if it came in different shades.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C'de Baca

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It does nothing goes on eyelids and disappears wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Made my eyes burn
customer_reviews.text: This product made my eyes water and burn after applying it. I've never had this experience with an eye product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: I saw no difference, have been using for over 2 weeks and don't feel that my shadow stays on any better. Would not purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works great but a little oily feeling when you put it on and need to wait a few minutes for it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Stand

customer_reviews.title: Smudges and smears
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this product. It smears bad and doesn’t hold the color like other primers. I bought the nyx eyeshadow base and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: does what it says, my eye shadow stayed all day even in drizzly weather and I never got a crease on my eyelid ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but a little oily feeling when you put it on and you need to wait a few minutes before putting on eyeshadow for it to dry
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like it. Feels kinda sticky and dont dry. Kinda oily
customer_reviews.author: Laura pizano

customer_reviews.title: Holds eyeshadow really well.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Goes on nice and smooth and dries relatively quick. Holds on eyeshadow really well I will include a before and after picture. The before being right after I applied the eyeshadow and the after being 13 hours later. When I used eyeshadow before trying out this primer I would always get a build up of the eyeshadow in the crease of my eyelids that would make a definite line. When using the primer I did still get a slight line but hardly even noticeable without looking really close for it. So I’m that regard I find this product to be a success!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: long wear
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised!! I have hooded lids so my eyeshadow never stays on, now it does :)
customer_reviews.author: Raq70

customer_reviews.title: This product is great it makes your eyeshadow pop and helps the colors ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great it makes your eyeshadow pop and helps the colors set as expected. It doesnt make eyes feel dry as most primers do. Its very smooth with a nice consistency
customer_reviews.author: Shop queen

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. I originally chose this for the price, and I normally use urban decay eye shadow primer. I have creases on my eye lids by 1-2pm each day I use this, and it also makes my eye lids feel very heavy. Will not be purchasing again, despite the price I would rather not use anything than this product.
customer_reviews.author: randie smith

customer_reviews.title: Glides on easy. No eyeshadow creases
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it is supposed to do. I've used similar products and they all seem about the same. Nothing special so go for something with the lowest price per size.
customer_reviews.author: Kpadd1962

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good eye shadow primer that wasn't too costly, and this fit the bill nicely. It IS silky smooth and works like a charm. It does take a few seconds to dry. I will definitely buy this one again!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Gish

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt impressed with this product. It did not last and did not keep my eye shadow from creasing. The color is pretty but even worn alone it creased.
customer_reviews.author: Penny2018:)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shadow base.
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful product. It really works great on my old I lids. Color is soft and easy to work around. Shadow stays all day. I wish they made shadows too.
customer_reviews.author: Karol W. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend it and certaintly won't buy it again, just a bunch of chemicals which destroy the goodness of the skin, why bother?!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kidwell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your eyeshadow where you put it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps your eyeshadow in place. A bit sticky. But, I don't have to worry about my eyeshadow rubbing off.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well! Eye shadow doesn't crease or clump and stays looking good all day! A very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! It keeps my eyeshadow on all day. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeshadow Primer!
customer_reviews.text: Applies nicely and keeps eyeshadow from creasing. Would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Littletuna

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: nothing special about this- pretty thin and doesn't prevent shadow crease as well as some other products I have used
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: More like eye shadow “glue”
customer_reviews.text: This product is bad news ~ sticky tacky a big mess. Made eye makeup a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! It keeps my shadow on until I take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery - good price and value
customer_reviews.text: ease of application - good color - using as a lip liner
customer_reviews.author: D. Shaul

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: It is as efficient as a 20 dollar primer! Highly recommend it. Unfortunately, I cannot find it on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eva H.

product_meta.title: Golden Rose Silky Smooth Base Eyeshadow Primer For Crease-Proof, Fade-Proof Long Wear Eye Makeup
product_meta.description:
Say good-bye to creased and faded eyeshadow. Ever create a killer eye look just to have it fade and crease a few hours later? Avoid those cringe-worthy eyeshadow blunders with Golden Rose Eyeshadow Primer. The silky smooth formula is sheer and weightless. It won’t feel heavy on your eyelids. And it’s suitable for all skin tones. This eyeshadow primer increases your eyeshadow longevity and vibrancy for an all-day clump-free wear. A lot of other eye primers include a built in applicator that wastes product and, oftentimes, prevents you from putting on your makeup how you like to. Golden Rose Eyeshadow Primer does not have a built in applicator. Enjoy the freedom to blend your eyeshadow primer with whichever tools you choose. Suitable for all types of eye makeup! 11mL (0.37 fl.oz.) tube.

Easy application. Application is simple. Apply a thin layer on your bare eyelids. Wait 30 seconds. Then apply your eye makeup.

Golden Rose Eyeshadow Primer is dermatologically tested and paraben-free for your safety, and is never tested on animals.

Extend the wear of your eyeshadow. Buy Golden Rose Eyeshadow Primer now for a crease-free vibrant eye makeup.
feature_bullets: SHEER FOR ALL SKIN TONES - no matter what tone your skin is, Golden Rose Eyeshadow Primer is sheer.
BLENDS FLAWLESSLY - the lightweight formula blends like a dream with your existing makeup tools or your fingers.
NO APPLICATOR TIP - this little tube of magic does not include an applicator tip, which means you have more control over how you apply it.  Try dabbing with a makeup brush or your finger tips!
CREASE-PROOF EYE MAKEUP - unlike cheap eyelid primers, Golden Rose Eyeshadow Primer prevents those cringe-worthy creases without clumping.
DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED, PARABEN-FREE, AND CRUELTY-FREE.  11mL (0.37 fl.oz.) tube.
